name: Super Auto Coots (Bocary)
description:
Super Auto Coots is an entry for the Ludwig Game Jam 2023 made by solo developer Marco F. Wejse (Bocary).

How to open: Unzip the zip file and open SuperAutoCoots.exe

Free assets include:

-Sprout Lands by Cup Nooble,

-Pixel Cat & Fox by Elthen,

-Complete GUI Essential Pack by Crusenho,

-RPG Music Pack by Alkakrab,

-Hand drawn sprites by Jonas Wilhelm Berg.

I hope you enjoy the game!
